remarks: Ostrowski's theorem, which classifies all absolute values on ` QQ ` . Any such absolute value must either be the trivial absolute value ` K ` , a constant exponent ` 0 < a <_ 1 ` times the regular absolute value, or a positive exponent times the p-adic absolute value. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 10-Sep-2014.)
